cards.suite_desc: Modular desktop tool ecosystem. A powerful launcher unifying plugins, scripts, and automation in a unified interface.
cards.xml_desc: Program that facilitates translating game XML files. Edit translation strings with ease, safety, and speed.
cards.lyrics_desc: Minimalist Rainmeter skin. Displays playing song lyrics in a single line over the taskbar. Always on Top.
cards.csv_desc: Advanced tool to clean, normalize, and convert CSV contact lists. Ideal for Google Contacts migration.
cards.taskpulse_desc: Minimalist system monitor for Rainmeter. Real-time CPU, GPU, RAM, and Network tracking with HWiNFO integration.

benefits.efficiency_desc: Tools that get straight to the point. No bloated interfaces, just what's needed to solve the problem.
benefits.local_desc: Real privacy. Your files (XMLs, CSVs) are processed on your machine, with no hidden uploads.
benefits.opensource_desc: Total transparency. Auditable code available on GitHub for community contribution.
benefits.ultralight_desc: Low-level optimized code. No bloatware, no invasive tracking, just pure functionality.
benefits.privacy_desc: Your data stays on your device. Our apps work 100% offline by default design.
benefits.design_desc: Consistent and predictable interface across all products, reducing cognitive load.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Full transparency on how our software works.
privacy.local_desc: All software developed by STZ LABS (CSV Converter, XML Translator, Lyrics, Suite) is designed to process data locally on your machine. We do not send your files, contacts, or XMLs to proprietary servers.
privacy.api_desc: Some tools use external services to function:
privacy.contact_desc: If you have questions about security or source code, you can audit our repositories on GitHub or contact us via Discord.

game_xml.title: Game XML Translator
game_xml.description: The definitive tool for modders and localization teams. Automate the translation of complex dialogue files while maintaining structural game integrity.

features.ai_desc: Native integration with Google Gemini API for high-quality contextual translations, outperforming conventional auto-translators.
features.integrity_desc: The extraction and injection algorithm meticulously preserves node order, attributes, and comments. Your game won't break.
features.glossary_desc: Maintain term consistency (proper names, locations, items) across multiple files with the built-in glossary manager.
features.ui_desc: Built with CustomTkinter for a pleasant visual experience (Dark Mode) and intuitive workflow.
features.progress_desc: Visually track the translation status of each file and the project as a whole.
features.export_desc: One-click export with basic structural validation to ensure the final file is game-ready.

lyrics.title: STZ Lyrics
lyrics.description: Transform your taskbar with minimalist, perfectly synced song lyrics. Simple, lightweight, and fully customizable.

features.sync_desc: Uses the massive LRCLIB.net database to fetch line-by-line synced lyrics for your favorite songs.
features.design_desc: An elegant single line floating above your taskbar, showing only what matters at the exact moment.
features.custom_desc: Intuitive settings panel to adjust fonts, sizes, colors, shadows, and window dimensions.
features.delay_desc: Audio ahead? Use the built-in offset control to adjust lyric timing in real-time.
features.wnp_desc: Robust support for modern players (Spotify, YouTube, SoundCloud) via browser extension.
features.top_desc: Can be configured to remain always visible, ensuring you never miss a verse.

csv_converter.title: STZ CSV Converter
csv_converter.description: Smart cleaning, normalization, and conversion of contact lists. Prepare your data for Google Contacts with surgical precision.

features.clean_desc: Removes invalid characters, formats phone numbers (IDD), and standardizes names automatically.
features.dedup_desc: Detects and merges duplicate contacts based on phone numbers, avoiding clutter in your address book.
features.mapping_desc: Visual interface to map columns from your original CSV to expected fields (Name, Phone, Tags).
features.report_desc: Generates a full JSON report with statistics, warnings, and suspicious contacts list after each processing.
features.ui_desc: Fluid and responsive user experience, with background processing so the interface doesn't freeze.
features.google_desc: Focused on generating perfectly formatted files for direct import into Google Contacts.

taskpulse.title: STZ TaskPulse
taskpulse.description: The pulse of your hardware on your desktop. Real-time monitoring of vital resources with minimalist cyberpunk aesthetics.

features.monitor_desc: Track CPU usage, GPU (via HWiNFO), RAM memory, and network traffic (Download/Upload) instantly.
features.design_desc: Clean look and modern typography that integrates perfectly into any setup, without visual pollution.
features.clock_desc: Date and time highlighted with easy-to-read font, eliminating the need for extra widgets.
features.hwinfo_desc: Precise reading of advanced hardware sensors via the HWiNFO plugin for Rainmeter.
features.lightweight_desc: Negligible resource consumption. Your PC focuses on the game or work, not the monitoring.
features.custom_desc: Structured code and clear variables allow you to easily adjust colors, sizes, and sensors.
